Name: Fly Or Die
About the game: Fly Or Die is a side-scrolling side-scrolling shooter in which the player acts as the pilot of a military aircraft. You will have to plunge headlong into the atmosphere and the universal brutality of air battles during a stormy and terrible war. By destroying the enemy fleet, the player earns money, which can and should be used to buy ammunition, bomber support, and improve his aircraft. Survive ten days in different hot spots at the helm, or die proudly behind it.
